subject: Redesign table view as Admin panel for all model configuration
body:
Major Changes:
- Removed Form/Table view toggle (was limited to selected models only)
- Added 4th calculator mode: Admin Panel
- Admin panel shows ALL 20 revenue models in spreadsheet-style table
- Enables centralized editing of default parameters across all models
- Layout: Parameters as rows, Models as columns
- Real-time updates to model defaults
- Sticky headers for easy navigation
- Horizontal scrolling for all 19 models

UI Updates:
- Calculator mode buttons now in 2x2 grid (Vendor, Growth, Client, Admin)
- Admin mode hides category/model selection (not needed)
- Admin button uses ⚙️ icon for clarity

Documentation:
- Updated README.md with Admin Mode usage guide
- Updated claude.md with Admin Mode technical specification
- Removed all references to old Table View feature

Technical Implementation:
- New generateAdminPanel() function
- New onAdminInputChange() event handler
- Updated setCalculatorMode() to handle 'admin' mode
- Removed old table view code (generateTableView, setInputView, etc.)
- Cleaned up global state (removed currentInputView variable)
